reviewText: Awesome.  This is a great set that's worth buying (if you don't have netflix).  I found it to be interesting regardless of political point of view.

so OFFENSIVE that I would never purchase this product; let alone the SUBJECT matter.

"An American Family"? How many Depression Era "American Families" were DESTROYED by Joe Kennedy to amass the Kennedy fortune?

I can think of too many other titles that would be much more apropos for the story of these BIOLOGICAL ANOMALIES.

Nuff said, as my blood is boiling sufficiently.
